urls.title: Gorillaz & Smirnoff present: Murdoc Niccals Mixology Masterclass and Q&A
urls.description: Re-live Gorillaz & Smirnoff present: Murdoc Niccals Mixology Masterclass for a limited time only! Over 18’s only / No ID, no entry!Pre-order the forthcoming ...

data.text:
Shake up a Vodka Murdini with @gorillaz bassist Murdoc Niccals as we throw it back to last week’s live Mixology Masterclass https://t.co/JtOneSPDJB 🍸 

#SmirnoffxGorillaz #SmirnoffTrueOriginals #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/i5mtxRbNpK

data.text:
Not long to go until the Smirnoff x @gorillaz LIVE Mixology Masterclass! Join us at 6pm GMT tonight 🍸: https://t.co/Lsvf0Axbdu

#SmirnoffxGorillaz #SmirnoffTrueOriginals #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/5Q2Fx9i8Jq

urls.title: Gorillaz & Smirnoff present: Murdoc Niccals Mixology Masterclass and Q&A
urls.description: Re-live Gorillaz & Smirnoff present: Murdoc Niccals Mixology Masterclass for a limited time only! Over 18’s only / No ID, no entry!Pre-order the forthcoming ...

data.text:
Pull up a virtual bar stool & get ready for a one of a kind Mixology Masterclass hosted by @gorillaz bassist Murdoc Niccals. Make The Vodka Murdini on 24/11 at 6pm GMT here: https://t.co/sVzRn6AWFK

 #SmirnoffxGorillaz #SmirnoffTrueOriginals #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/GwjalsfgXj

NEW Smirnoff Cherry Drop flavoured vodka is bursting with the taste of sweet, sun-ripe cherries 🍒😍 Enjoy this juicy flavour over ice with cola or lemonade: https://t.co/ayv7iNgPpE https://t.co/aFzFWTurOA

urls.title: @smirnoffgb | Linktree
urls.description: Linktree. Make your link do more.

data.text:
The new Smirnoff x @Gorillaz bottles are available NOW. Shaking up music & mixology, you’ll find Murdoc, 2D, Noodle and Russel sipping their signature Smirnoff cocktails on the exclusive bottle: https://t.co/5nnJOvxC9r
#SmirnoffxGorillaz #SmirnoffTrueOriginals  #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/RswtDGMsAf

It’s time to shake things up… Smirnoff X @gorillaz I True Originals limited edition bottle coming to you very soon. Keep your eyes peeled this Thursday 👀

#SmirnoffxGorillaz #SmirnoffTrueOriginals #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/Elq6QWO9UC

NEW FLAVOUR ALERT ✨

Smirnoff Berry Burst is a delicious blend of bold, fruity blueberry and blackberry flavours. Enjoy the burst of berry in a tall glass over ice with lemonade.

Available now exclusively at @Morrisons 

#Smirnoff #Drinkresponsibly https://t.co/INLjHnBDx7
@liamsholder91 Thanks Liam! Glad you're a fan 😎

@truthserum2022 Some people love Smirnoff so much, they try to make it themselves. We’re always watching out for bootleggers, it’s never as good as the real thing. Speak to our Customer Care line on 0345 601 4558 and they can help you work out if you’ve got the real stuff or not.
@Andy_Watt Enjoy! 🥭
@_BecRx Hi Bec, this flavour isn't available in the UK. Why not try one of our other great flavours? Find out how to get your hands on them here: https://t.co/9YW0p9m9xe

@_wotta Hi Joe, our Consumer Care team will be able to assist with any questions regarding product ingredients. Feel free to give us a call on 0345 601 4558, or email via consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com. Thanks!

@erisonfire Hi there, it is suitable for people who are coeliac, however, corn is used in the distilling process and could irritate those with corn sensitivity. If you require any further info please give us a call on 0345 601 4558 or email consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com.

@JKressinger Hey Jamie, thanks for raising this. If you would like to contact our Consumer Care team on 0345 601 4558 or by emailing consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com, they will be able to help you further with this.

@Al_021029 Hey, thanks for your question! Please see the FAQs here: https://t.co/R5Iy0469Yu If you continue to have issues, please contact the Consumer Care team on consumercare.GBandIreland@diageo.com. Thanks!
@katherinepink85 Hi Katherine, this flavour isn't available in the UK. You can view the full range here: https://t.co/MttduODPiF
Live for the unconventional with Smirnoff’s new flavour Mango & Passionfruit Twist, exclusively available at Tesco 🌴 #Smirnoff #SmirnoffMangoPassionfruit https://t.co/oBnxZw9WPX
Celebrate this season with a delicious Smirnoff Raspberry Crush Spritz ✨ #Smirnoff #SmirnoffRaspberryCrush https://t.co/eBIeuZxvgx
@Dan_Lee85 Hey Daniel, thanks for your question! Our Smirnoff Raspberry Crush is available now. You can find out more here: https://t.co/omNPAU9ZpI

Introducing our new Smirnoff flavoured vodka, Mango & Passionfruit Twist, for the new way to stir up seasonal traditions, bursting with bold and juicy tropical taste. Exclusively at @Tesco 🥭 Click https://t.co/ukV03FTbRc to buy. #Smirnoff #SmirnoffMangoPassionfruit #NewRelease https://t.co/jcXnaDljhk
@Charlot31941149 Hey Charlotte, sorry to hear this. Please contact our Customer Care team on 03456014558, and they will be able to help with this. Thank you.
With @MercedesfBenson on the buttons and #SmirnoffRaspberryCrush in your glass, we’ve got your drinks with friends set-up taken care of! #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/ZOYHIVrhR5

@Benngii Hey, sorry to hear this. If you would like to contact our Consumer Care team on 0345 601 4558 or by emailing consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com, they will be able to help you further with this. Thanks!

When it comes to outfits, @Sara_Waiste has got you covered. When it comes to bold, refreshing and easy to make cocktails, that’s where we come in with a #SmirnoffRaspberryCrushSpritz #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/CcnVNiUAUF

@Me_SarcasticSCO Hey, sorry to hear this. If you would like to contact our Consumer Care team on 0345 601 4558 or by emailing consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com, they will be able to help you further with this.

Will Billy the Geezer swap his normal pint for something a little more fruity? @DontJealousMe tempts him to a new #SmirnoffRaspberryCrushWooWoo. Watch to find out if Billy goes for it. #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/HYIuF3pLSB

Fake tan? Kitchen Disco? Skinny dipping? @RomanKemp doesn’t do ‘normal’ cocktail tutorials. That’s why we love him ❤️ See how Roman gets on with a quickfire question round whist making a #SmirnoffRaspberryCrush. #DrinkResponsibly https://t.co/InkYZHpvVY
@atytwo Hey Tom, unfortunately no plans on it at the moment but you never know! 😎
@DLW2182 Hey David, please get in touch with consumercare.GBandIreland@diageo.com
@pickled_tinker Thanks for the love, we're not the world's #1 vodka for nothing 😉
@Gromuls It can be pretty common, but if you do have any concerns don't hesitate to get in touch with our Consumer Care team via consumercareGBandIreland@Diageo.com.

@Gromuls Hi Rihards, the likelihood is your freezer is too cold. All vodka at 37.5% ABV stays a liquid at the temperature of a normal domestic freezer, but will freeze once if it's too cold. It doesn't affect the taste or quality of the product though; so don't worry on that front.
@abigailmccx Glad you liked it! 😎

@mrsmoss2006 Hey Claire, thanks for your question! You can get in touch with our Consumer Care team via consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com. They will be able to answer all of your product related questions 😀

@SilverDionysus Hey there, thanks for your question! You can find out all about our products at https://t.co/5t8HUTonz4 or feel free to give us a call on 0345 601 4558, or via consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com if you would like to chat to our Customer Care team.

@lewispickles0 Hey Lewis, thanks for your question! Please get in touch with our Consumer Care team via  consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com and they will be able to help you with all your product related questions. Cheers, Smirnoff.

@JackPerks5 Hi Jack, the likelihood is your freezer is too cold. All vodka at 37.5% ABV stays a liquid at the temperature of a normal domestic freezer, but will freeze once if it's too cold. It doesn't affect the taste or quality of the product though. It can be pretty common.
@HannahShoree Hey Hannah, thanks for your question! Please get in touch with our consumer care team via consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com and they will be able to help you. Cheers, Smirnoff

@Nat_kf Hey Nat, sorry to hear about your experience. If you would like to contact our Consumer Care team by emailing consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com, they will be able to help you further with any questions. Best wishes, Smirnoff

@JunexMaiden Hey Angie, unfortunately it's not 😔

@nichola_rankin Hey Nicola, the likelihood your freezer is now too cold. All vodka at 37.5% ABV stays a liquid at the temperature of a normal domestic freezer, but will freeze once if it's too cold. It doesn't affect the taste or quality of the product though; so don't worry on that front.
@julie_s07 Hey Julie, try giving it a search online, you should be able to find some retailers that stock it!
@KingofWing Hey Robin, sorry to hear this! If you would like to contact our Consumer Care team by emailing consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com, they will be able to help you further with this.

@claredocherty1 Glad you're a fan! Cheers 🍹
Vodka is better than gin 😎
@Dtm27Dan Hey Dan, thanks for getting in touch. Unfortunately we’re not offering any sponsorships right now. Good luck with your new venture! Cheers, Smirnoff
@KatSimps14 Hi Kathryn, thanks for your question! That is unfortunately correct. Have a look at our website to see which Smirnoff products are available for purchase: https://t.co/zSHNKgBvIW
@ClaireL47542055 We never say never!
@AtomVal Hi there, please get in touch with consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com and specify your location, and they will able to put you in touch with your local Consumer Care team. Cheers, Smirnoff
@gearaguirang 🤐
@Dr_mashimz Hi there, thank you for the watch out! Please pass this on to @SmirnoffSA
@TreaveW It can be pretty common, but if you do have any concerns don't hesitate to get in touch via consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com

@TreaveW Hi Treave, the likelihood is your freezer is too cold. All vodka at 37.5% ABV stays a liquid at the temperature of a normal domestic freezer, but will freeze once if it's too cold. It doesn't affect the taste or quality of the product though; so don't worry on that front.

@eliseymarshall Hi Elise, Smirnoff vodka is suitable for people who are coeliac, however corn is used in the distilling process and could possibly irritate those with corn sensitivity. If you have any other questions, please get in touch with consumercare.GBandIreland@Diageo.com

@eliseymarshall Hi Elise, the Smirnoff vodka used to make Smirnoff Ice does not contain any gluten due to the distillation process having removed all traces of allergenic materials. The flavours used in Smirnoff Ice also do not contain gluten. As such, Smirnoff Ice does not contain gluten.
@_534n13 No need to apologise 👀

tweets.text: @SmirnoffEurope the new Smirnoff vodka raspberry crush is absolutely unreal best vodka flavour yet well done ✅
@SmirnoffEurope I emailed the the address you keep posting to tweets yesterday about fake Smirnoff and had no reply …. I was hoping for more advice etc…..
Tonight’s tipple! ⁦@SmirnoffEurope⁩ https://t.co/MOeiHlf18g
@SmirnoffEurope What do you use to colour your Raspberry vodka? Is it natural colourings?
@SmirnoffEurope Hey, is red label Smirnoff gluten free?

@SmirnoffEurope wondering why Smirnoff bottles behind the counter are still sold with a diamond promotion label only to find out it expired on 31st of 12 2021. These bottles should now be pulled or the promotion tags removed.  The word con comes to mind.  #absolute next time.
@SmirnoffEurope can you tell where the code is located for the diamond prize? I’ve got 8 bottles all frozen and I can’t find a code on any of them
@SmirnoffEurope I know Smirnoff Ice is still available in UK but can you still get Smirnoff Black Ice in the UK? It was amazing.
@SmirnoffEurope I believe it was discontinued a while back, but do you do any products similar to Smirnoff Norsk? https://t.co/YpYmOc5mJI
@SmirnoffEurope Hi, why does my vodka look like this? https://t.co/TtnppHtDEr
I received the same game code on two different 21 Diamonds freezer bottles @SmirnoffEurope. How many codes are repeated? I wanted to enter twice. https://t.co/IDnIgJ9duG
@SmirnoffEurope any idea when Smirnoff blue label (No. 57) will be available in the UK again?
@SmirnoffEurope hi Smirnoff. Could u direct me to the person who deals with POS/sales in central London. https://t.co/rhJHIr6kkx
@SmirnoffEurope ok, I'll give you benefit of the doubt. Your Recipe No.21 is a bloody delicious Vodka. Literally, was just how it should be. Not scented, not flavoured. This went down soooo smooth!
Bērni, nekad nepērciet rietumos @SmirnoffEurope šņabi 🛑! TĀ NAV VODKA! 37,5 grādi un saldētavā sasalst 🤷🏼‍♂️ šņabis nesasalst! https://t.co/hhnii7cUR9
The new @SmirnoffEurope raspberry crush vodka is sooo nice😍🍹
@SmirnoffEurope Hi!! Please can you tell me, is this bottle of deliciousness Gluten Free 🤞🤞 https://t.co/i2LobNFl2F
@SmirnoffEurope hi, Can you tell me I'd Smirnoff Ice contains Aspartame??

@SmirnoffEurope Please could you confirm for me if your Smirnoff Raspberry Crush has sugar in it or not? My Dad is diabetic but it always seems impossible to find out if they have sugar in them or not! If it does can you tell me how much please. Thanks :)
@Tesco / @SmirnoffEurope selling dodgy vodka!? I’m pretty sure vodka isn’t meant to freeze at all… wtf is in this bottle then 👀 https://t.co/mS0togTDHv
@SmirnoffEurope Does Smirnoff ice contain caffeine? 🙃
@SmirnoffEurope Smirnoff pink lemonade….Uk?
@SmirnoffEurope I bought a bottle today and it didn’t taste like usual. It tasted like cheap vodka. I’m very disappointed as I paid £20 for it and it tasted weird. #disappointed
@SmirnoffEurope When ate you going to sell black ice again in the UK. I miss that so much it was beautiful #beingbackblackice #smirnoffblackice #blackicewasamazing
@SmirnoffEurope any news on the smirnoff mule bottles coming back?

The dream delivery just in time for the bank holiday. Solar lights, a cushion, beach bag and @SmirnoffEurope seltzers. Lookong forward to trying out their new flavour, mango & passion fruit. 😍🤤🌞  #smirnoffdowner #smirnoffseltzer #giftedbysmirnoff https://t.co/OVjkLzQuYg

@SmirnoffEurope
Why is my Vodka freezing solid? 🤔 Not the 1st time recently this has happened. I always keep my Vodka in my freezer and have done for years with no issues.. https://t.co/Dple6zj3QW
@SmirnoffEurope why have you stopped selling apple vodka, it was the best?
My @SmirnoffEurope bottle was leaking, never seen this before 💀 lost precious vodka (water in the video as I refilled it to video) https://t.co/sVXS39iOPF
@SmirnoffEurope I'm loving this Vodka Passion Fruit Martini 🍸👌
@SmirnoffEurope would you be interested in sponsoring a brand new internet radio station called holiday radio or advertising on the station or sponsoring one of the shows??
@SmirnoffEurope can you still get Smirnoff Nordic Berries or has it been discontinued?

Dear @SmirnoffEurope 
Once upon a time, you created amazing frozen slushes and we loved them.  There was nothing better than coming in from work,  lying in the garden catching the last of the days sun, with a Smirnoff slush in your hand.  Can you PLEASE bring them back!!! https://t.co/auvZvQF6NS
@SmirnoffEurope there is someone selling a fake smirnoff in South Africa how can I report that?

@SmirnoffEurope so pure it freezes in a freezer... not even sure how this is scientifically possible, maybe your taking Smirnoff ice to the next level. Thankfully got a dyson to clear up this trash. Back to @stoli #scam @Ukfoodstandards https://t.co/UIBpsSCIvh
#RuPaulsDragRaceUK & @SmirnoffEurope tonight, sorry @ABSOLUTUK I ran out. #vodka #sundaydrinking #chillout https://t.co/O7aQpEKpxx

@SmirnoffEurope @SmirnoffUS can you help have private messaged you we always drink Smirnoff and just brought your Vanilla one but my wife had an allergic reaction to it can you tell me what ingredients are in it. https://t.co/HlLDIRuyx0
@SmirnoffEurope @SmirnoffUS where can I find Tamarind Vodka in the UK!!!!!!???????? 😭🤤🤤🤤
Happy valentine’s day @SmirnoffEurope ❤️
happy valentine’s day @SmirnoffEurope❤️
@_seraphim30 @vasilisadamaris @SmirnoffEurope  cheers to infinity and beyond friendship https://t.co/fcmMbn7mlI
@SmirnoffEurope has smirnoff cider been discontinued?

@SmirnoffEurope @SmirnoffUS can you please tell me what sweeteners are in a #smirnoffice ? As it doesn’t state in your ingredients nor on your website just on the front of the bottle it says sweeteners but not which ones.
@SmirnoffEurope Hey guys! I just wondered if you were able to share the sugar content in your Vodka North - I track my macros and I can’t find the information anywhere online! Thanks so much!
@SmirnoffEurope I contacted you regarding Smirnoff Cranberry?  Can you advise if this is still being made and where to buy in UK?
